com.google.zxing.oned

类 UPCEReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.zxing.oned.OneDReader
      • com.google.zxing.oned.UPCEANReader
        • com.google.zxing.oned.UPCEReader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Reader

    public final class UPCEReader
extends UPCEANReader

    Implements decoding of the UPC-E format.

    This is a great reference for UPC-E information.

    作者:
    Sean Owen

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 com.google.zxing.oned.OneDReader

    • 方法详细资料

      • decodeMiddle

        protected int decodeMiddle(BitArray row,
               int[] startRange,
               StringBuilder result)
                    throws NotFoundException
        从类复制的说明: UPCEANReader
        Subclasses override this to decode the portion of a barcode between the start and end guard patterns.
        指定者:
        decodeMiddle 在类中 UPCEANReader
        参数:
        row - row of black/white values to search
        startRange - start/end offset of start guard pattern
        result - StringBuilder to append decoded chars to
        返回:
        horizontal offset of first pixel after the "middle" that was decoded
        抛出:
        NotFoundException - if decoding could not complete successfully

      • decodeEnd

        protected int[] decodeEnd(BitArray row,
              int endStart)
                   throws NotFoundException
        抛出:
        NotFoundException

      • checkChecksum

        protected boolean checkChecksum(String s)
                         throws FormatException,
                                ChecksumException
        返回:
        UPCEANReader.checkStandardUPCEANChecksum(CharSequence)
        抛出:
        FormatException
        ChecksumException

      • convertUPCEtoUPCA

        public static String convertUPCEtoUPCA(String upce)
        Expands a UPC-E value back into its full, equivalent UPC-A code value.
        参数:
        upce - UPC-E code as string of digits
        返回:
        equivalent UPC-A code as string of digits
